title: Kalaarasiga Lyrics Ambikapathy Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kalaarasiga
Singer: Shweta Mohan
Lyricst: Vairamuthu
Movie: Ambikapathy
Music: AR Rahman
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kalaarasiga ,hoi.. Kalaarasiga
Kalaarasiga, hoi... Kalaarasiga

Manniley vinniley pennaye kaanum
Kalaarasiga hoi.. Kalaarasiga
kanniley kandadhai kaiyiley allum
Kalaarasiga hoi..Kalaarasiga
Kalaarasiga hoi .. Kalaarasiga
Kalaarasiga

Saagasakaara, oru kaikuttai
thandhu selaiyai thirudum
sadhigaara
Kaasiyil vandhu sila
paavangal seidhu punniyam
thaedum paligaaraa

Paliyaal yaarum vaalndhadhu illai
meiyaal evarum veelndhadhu illai
kaatrinai pididhu kayirinai
thirikkum kaasi kalaarasigaa
hoi.. kadhal kalaarasigaa
kasikala rasiga..
pollaadha kaasi kalaarasiga
vaaraai kadhal kalaarasiga

Kan paaraai kadhal kalaa rasiga
kan paaraai kadhal kalaa rasiga
kaasi kalarasiga hoi hoi..
kadhal kalarasiga

Manniley vinniley pennaye kaanum
Kalaarasiga hoi.. Kalaarasiga
kanniley kandadhai kaiyiley allum
Kalaarasiga hoi..Kalaarasiga

Mangayin manadhai thirudum kannan
mandhiram thandhiram seivadhil mannan
kangalin kangalil mangalai thoovum
kalaarasiga
unmaiyai ennidam sol kalaarasiga
kalaarasiga ..hoi .. kalaarasiga

Aasai konda manamey perum
gangayai uniru kaigalil allida
paarkindraai

Veesum minnal oliyai un
paijaamaavin paikul olithida
paarkindaraai

Vettriyai petravan boomiku raaja
vetrilai potavan kaasiku raaja
kanjaadayal pootugal thirapaai
kaasi kalaarasiga hoi ..
kadhal kalaarasiga

pollaadha kaasi kalaarasiga
hoi hoi kadhal kalaarasiga
...

seo.title: Kalaarasiga Lyrics Ambikapathy Songs Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Kalaarasiga Lyrics Ambikapathy Songs Lyrics from Ambikapathy. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Shweta Mohan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
